title: Association Football. Pt. 1. Methods of coaching
creator_credit: Gaumont-British Instructional, Football Association, Edward Grossman and George Sturt
brief_description: Instructional film looking at the skills involved in the game of football (soccer). Shows football players involved in a range of drills including ball control, striking, passing etc. Also includes footage of England vs Wales (c1940s). Commentary by Raymond Glendenning.
creator_credit_for_label: Gaumont-British Instructional, Football Association, Edward Grossman and George Sturt
